fields.Title: WHIRLING F2 ORB / Moralist Quest Initiation
fields.Description: Empathy tells you it's time to take responsibility... by convening a committee to spread responsibility around.

fields.Title: START
input
Empathy: "Good, you're up. Listen, there's so..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Good, you're up. Listen, there's something that's been bothering you for a few days now.

fields.Title: Empathy: "It's a suspicion, or a feeling, rea..."
fields.Dialogue Text: It's a suspicion, or a feeling, really, that things are not quite *in hand* around here...

fields.Title: Empathy: "But who's focusing on *the big ques..."
fields.Dialogue Text: But who's focusing on *the big questions*?

fields.Title: Empathy: "But have you ever seen them? How do..."
fields.Dialogue Text: But have you ever seen them? How do you know they're even there? More importantly, how do you know they aren't waiting for *your participation*?

fields.Title: Jump to: [Empathy: "Only the most even-keeled minds in..."]
You: "Not my problem. [Discard thought.]"
fields.Dialogue Text: Not my problem. [Discard thought.]

fields.Title: Empathy: "You've got to find out who bears *l..."
fields.Dialogue Text: You've got to find out who bears *la responsabilité*.

fields.Title: You: "I assumed the most qualified and hi..."
fields.Dialogue Text: I assumed the most qualified and highly credentialed people were taking care of that stuff.

fields.Title: Esprit de Corps: "Your half-brother, the lieutenant,..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Your half-brother, the lieutenant, is a natural place to start.

fields.Title: Variable["tc.harry"]
Variable["tc.harry"]
!(Variable["tc.harry"])
Empathy: "Every day things seem to spin more..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Every day things seem to spin more and more wildly out of control. The centre isn't holding. And despite your efforts to *moderate* and *contain* these energies, things only seem to be getting worse.

fields.Title: You: "What am I supposed to do?"
fields.Dialogue Text: What am I supposed to do?

fields.Title: Untitled hub
You: "No way. I've got too much on my pla..."
fields.Dialogue Text: No way. I've got too much on my plate as it is. [Opt out.]

fields.Title: Empathy: "Come on. You know in your lungs tha..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Come on. You know in your lungs that true authority flows from institutions, not individuals. That's the single principle that separates civilisation from barbarism.
fields.Alternate1: Really, Harry. You know in your lungs that true authority flows from institutions, not individuals. That's the single principle that separates civilisation from barbarism.

fields.Title: Empathy: "If you want your work to be *accept..."
fields.Dialogue Text: If you want your work to be *accepted*, you'll have to go through the appropriate process.

fields.Title: Esprit de Corps: "The one you seem so set on driving..."
fields.Dialogue Text: The one you seem so set on driving away, the lieutenant, is a natural place to start.

fields.Title: Empathy: "Oh, sure. You've been making progre..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Oh, sure. You've been making progress on your case, interviewing people, *solving side tasks*...

fields.Title: You: "What exactly *is* la responsabilité..."
fields.Dialogue Text: What exactly *is* la responsabilité?

fields.Title: Empathy: "La responsabilité isn't concerned w..."
fields.Dialogue Text: La responsabilité isn't concerned with trivial questions like *who killed who*. It's about the real issues: the human welfare index, the price of staple goods, the transition to real democracy...

fields.Title: Variable["reputation.kim"] >1
Variable["reputation.kim"] >1
!(Variable["reputation.kim"] >1)
Jump to: [Empathy: "You've got to find out who bears *l..."]
You: "I thought I *was* assigning respons..."
fields.Dialogue Text: I thought I *was* assigning responsibility, for the murder?

fields.Title: IsTHCPresent("lawbringer")
IsTHCPresent("lawbringer")
!(IsTHCPresent("lawbringer"))
Empathy: "Open your eyes. Stop getting distra..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Open your eyes. Stop getting distracted by details. It's time you started focussing on what really matters.

fields.Title: Empathy: "Whoa, whoa, *whoa*. This isn't some..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Whoa, whoa, *whoa*. This isn't some kind of *dictatorship*. You can't simply seize la responsabilité for yourself. It must be given by a legitimate authority...

fields.Title: You: "And what happens once we've assigne..."
fields.Dialogue Text: And what happens once we've assigned responsibility?

fields.Title: You: "This really doesn't sound like my j..."
fields.Dialogue Text: This really doesn't sound like my job.

fields.Title: You: "Do we really have time for all this..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Do we really have time for all this?

fields.Title: Rhetoric: "In other words, it must be diffused..."
fields.Dialogue Text: In other words, it must be diffused across the entire bureaucracy, so that no one can ever truly say *who is responsible for what*.

fields.Title: Authority: "You don't need no stinkin' committe..."
fields.Dialogue Text: You don't need no stinkin' committee. You're the Law.

fields.Title: Authority: "Technicalities."
fields.Dialogue Text: Technicalities.

fields.Title: Electrochemistry: "Fun stuff, that's what they're capa..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Fun stuff, that's what they're capable of.

fields.Title: Half Light: "MASS EXECUTIONS."
fields.Dialogue Text: MASS EXECUTIONS.

fields.Title: Savoir Faire: "A little self-dealing?"
fields.Dialogue Text: A little self-dealing?

fields.Title: You: "And who should sit on this committe..."
fields.Dialogue Text: And who should sit on this committee?

fields.Title: Empathy: "Only the most even-keeled minds in..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Only the most even-keeled minds in Martinaise.

fields.Title: Empathy: "Together, you'll be able to discove..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Together, you'll be able to discover who has la responsabilité in Revachol. And if necessary, you'll have the *wisdom and expertise* to assign it among yourselves.

fields.Title: Empathy: "Don't run away from it now, Harry...."
fields.Dialogue Text: Don't run away from it now, Harry. You know it's the *right thing to do*.

fields.Title: You: "Alright, give it to me. *I'll* acce..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Alright, give it to me. *I'll* accept responsibility. (Proceed.)

fields.Title: Accept hub
Empathy: "Rest assured, no matter what happen..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Rest assured, no matter what happens it will be done through the proper channels.

fields.Title: Jump to: [Accept hub]
You: "Wait, I thought things were going p..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Wait, I thought things were going pretty well?

fields.Title: You: "But I'm the Law. Can't I just do it..."
fields.Dialogue Text: But I'm the Law. Can't I just do it myself?

fields.Title: You: "Sounds like too much responsibility..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Sounds like too much responsibility for me. I don't want it.

fields.Title: Jump to: [Empathy: "This is a grave abdication of la re..."]
Empathy: "It is human nature to crave la resp..."
fields.Dialogue Text: It is human nature to crave la responsabilité and to deny it. That's why it must be distributed across many different organisations, agencies, offices, and portfolios.

fields.Title: Empathy: "Most likely your findings will be c..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Most likely your findings will be collected in a report, which will be carefully reviewed by your superiors.

fields.Title: You: "What is it?"
fields.Dialogue Text: What is it?

fields.Title: You: "Let's get right to it: What needs t..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Let's get right to it: What needs to be done?

fields.Title: Empathy: "The most awesome, terrible thing..."
fields.Dialogue Text: The most awesome, terrible thing...

fields.Title: You: "I'm prepared to take on this awesom..."
fields.Dialogue Text: I'm prepared to take on this awesome burden. [Accept task.]

fields.Title: Jump to: [firsthub]
You: "You know what, this sounds like a d..."
fields.Dialogue Text: You know what, this sounds like a drag. [Refuse task.]

fields.Title: Empathy: "This is a grave abdication of la re..."
fields.Dialogue Text: This is a grave abdication of la responsabilité. A note will be appended to your personnel file.

fields.Title: Empathy: "Please, you're thinking about this..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Please, you're thinking about this too narrowly.

fields.Title: Jump to: [firsthub]
Empathy: "Harry, Harry. You're thinking about..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Harry, Harry. You're thinking about this too narrowly.

fields.Title: firsthub
Empathy: "Good luck. Your report is eagerly a..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Good luck. Your report is eagerly anticipated.

fields.Title: You: "(Sigh.) You're right. Who's going t..."
fields.Dialogue Text: (Sigh.) You're right. Who's going to sit on this committee?

fields.Title: Empathy: "Like a committee."
fields.Dialogue Text: Like a committee.

fields.Title: Volition: "Swift, decisive action."
fields.Dialogue Text: Swift, decisive action.

fields.Title: Logic: "An earth-shattering deduction from..."
fields.Dialogue Text: An earth-shattering deduction from your psyche. What will those guys come up with next?

fields.Title: Jump to: [Untitled hub]
Empathy: "There is always time to follow best..."
fields.Dialogue Text: There is always time to follow best practices. Once someone's decided to *cut corners* for the sake of expediency, who knows what else they're capable of?

fields.Title: Empathy: "Once they've reviewed it, those sam..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Once they've reviewed it, those same superiors will produce a set of recommendations to be taken up at the next meeting of the *standing committee*.

fields.Title: Jump to: [Untitled hub]
